item.title: PowerShell - Get Current User
item.description: # User Name Only $(Get-WMIObject -class Win32_ComputerSystem | select username).username [Environment]::UserName $env:username # Domain Name and User Name $(whoami) [System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent().Name # Domain [Environment]::UserDomainName # Machine Name [Environment]::MachineName
